value.title: How do you use RLS with Power BI Embedded???

value.title: Make your Power BI report POP with a custom background
value.excerpt: Is your report plain or bland? Patrick shows you how you can easily make your Power BI report pop with a custom background. value.title: Getting Started with Dataflow in Microsoft Fabric Data Factory
